amendment.description: To increase 2009 funding for Juvenile Justice Programs to $560 million, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4255 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4255 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Kohl. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2078-2080; text: CR 3/14/2008 S2080) To increase 2009 funding for Juvenile Justice Programs to $560 million, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4255 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4255 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Kohl.
